description: Inforrmation technologty synopsis of the information of the city
full_summary:
### Information Technology Consultation Services
#### Solicitation Number: W6369-22P5OM 

### Posting Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3646472548
* Posting Date: February 14, 2023
* Closing Date: April 11, 2023
* Amendment Number: 6
* Amendment Date: April 6, 2023

### Description of Requirement
This requirement is for the provision of Informatics professional services to support the modernization and extension of Command and Control Systems capabilities. The services will be provided in support of a project to build a modern, centrally managed site that enables effective joint operational command and control, coordination, and intelligence capabilities, as well as defence research capabilities and operational support resources.

### Eligibility Criteria
Only Teranet Bid Integration and Purchasing System (TBIPS) Standards Agreement (SA) Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 in all required resource categories in this solicitation in the National Capital Region (NCR) Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are eligible to compete.

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria is a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Delivery Locations
The services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Carlos Cabannes, SPAC/PSPC at: [carlos.cabannes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carlos.cabannes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
